channel.description: Recent content in Sessions on Moonfall Sessions

item.title: 23: Memorial and Racing Preparations
item.description: The party holds a memorial service for Red while discovering new threats and preparing for a dangerous racing event in Milstrom.

item.title: 22: Red's Last Fight
item.description: The party faces an impossible choice on a frozen mountaintop as destiny calls for the ultimate sacrifice.

item.title: Interlude VII: The Lotus Hotel Hangover
item.description: The party enjoys a wild night at a magical casino, only to wake up with no memory and a series of increasingly bizarre problems to solve.

item.title: Interlude VI: The Final Ritual
item.description: The party completes their mission to help Toonlock by participating in a dangerous ritual while facing Crowley’s final threats and earning powerful rewards.

item.title: Interlude V: The Wichita Sisters' Guardian
item.description: The party navigates treacherous fog and spider-infested cliffs to reach the Wichita Sisters’ cave, only to face a massive guardian at the entrance.

item.title: Interlude IV: Into the Hollow
item.description: The party ventures into a treacherous swamp to retrieve the final item needed to help Toonlock, facing deadly perytons and undead in the bog waters.

item.title: Interlude III: The Corrupted Sanctuary
item.description: The party completes their infiltration of the vampire convent, facing a monstrous Mother Superior and freeing a tortured angel from its cursed bonds.

item.title: Interlude II: Murder at the Manor
item.description: The party attends a birthday party that turns from game to deadly reality when a shapeshifting night hag is revealed as the true killer.

item.title: Interlude I: The Convent of Bloody Orchids
item.description: The party infiltrates a vampire convent to retrieve a priest’s stole, battling undead nuns and terrifying angel statues.

item.title: 21: Trapped In Tree Land
item.description: The party helps trapped villagers with their daily problems while uncovering the dark truth behind their astral tree sanctuary.

item.title: 20: Trials of the W****M Hole
item.description: The Taco Cat crew ventures into the mysterious wormhole for Red’s Skyhammer trials, solving ancient puzzles and meeting a star-touched dragon before descending into the chaotic village of Lakeshore Vale.

item.title: Winter Solstice Special
item.description: The party returns to Milstrom for winter solstice festivities, only to face an evil doppelganger threatening their celebration.

item.title: 17: The Skyhammers
item.description: The party reaches Red’s ancestral clan and discovers advanced technology, but Red must prove his lineage through dangerous trials.

item.title: 16: Olivia's Decision
item.description: The party rescues George from the Shadowfell and witnesses a catastrophic celestial event.

item.title: 15: On George's Heels
item.description: The party pursues George and the pilgrims up Grimvar’s Spine, discovering a corrupted shrine and fighting to restore its protective wards.

item.title: 14: Ascending Grimvar's Spine
item.description: The party begins their pilgrimage up Grimvar’s Spine mountain, where they encounter a peculiar shepherd and his unruly magical sheep.

item.title: 13: Burning down the house
item.description: The party closes the portal, decides Frankie’s fate, and investigates Red’s family history with explosive consequences.

item.title: 12: Out of the frying pan, into the Fire
item.description: The party pursues werewolves, recruits an unlikely ally, and faces their most dangerous battle yet.

item.title: 11: You Only Live Once
item.description: The party drinks Roscoe’s Everclear and uncovers Red’s royal past while wolves descend on the town

item.title: 10: The Red Scare
item.description: The party uncovers a devil’s grip on Milstrom

item.title: 9: A Stranger at the Crossroads
item.description: The party enters the woods to break a fae bargain and strikes a dangerous deal with Mr. Crowley.

item.title: 8: Caravan Nights
item.description: Tacocats take a moment to meet caravan folks.

item.title: 7: Escape Highforge
item.description: A Dragon Attacks! Our heroes seek to escape highforge!

item.title: 6: Highforge Sprint
item.description: Our heroes race the Highforge Sprint!

item.title: 5: A Pretty Good Concert
item.description: Our heroes throw a pretty good concert.

item.title: 4: Love and Betrayal
item.description: Our heroes get an assignment to sabotage some racecars.

item.title: 3: Unraveling Twilight
item.description: The party is in the dwarven city of High Forge, a place with strict rules.
